charinfo.name: Naraka Path Pein (S)
charinfo.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) is one of the six paths of Pein. This path is able to interrogate its enemies at will. Naraka Path Pein (S) can also give life as well as take it.

abilities.name: Outer Path
abilities.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) summons the Outer Path gaining 25% damage reduction and dealing 10 damage to all enemies for 3 turns. Judgement can be used during this skill.

abilities.name: Judgement
abilities.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) passes Judgement on one enemy when Outer Path is being used. That enemy will be dealt 20 damage and ignore healing effects for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Rejuvenation
abilities.description: Naraka Path Pein (S) uses Rejuvenation on himself or an ally. That character will be healed for 25 health.

abilities.name: Chakra Rod Deflection
abilities.description: This skill makes Naraka Path Pein (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
